body_html:
Wow it looks like html5lib tags each release with two IDs. One <1.0 and one >1.0. https://pypi.python.org/pypi/html5lib So 0.9999999 actually is the same version we're using now, which is 1.0b8. What a nightmare. Sending a PR now.

CC: @dandelionmane

body:
Wow it looks like html5lib tags each release with two IDs. One <1.0 and one >1.0. https://pypi.python.org/pypi/html5lib So 0.9999999 actually is the same version we're using now, which is 1.0b8. What a nightmare. Sending a PR now.
